episode_event_trainersfile_ch0125_ch0121: You wanna leave Team Skull, huh?
No!

A true Team Skull member always butts heads and
answers with a hearty “No!”
Not now! You’re just confusing everyone.
Yes, ma’am.

Both you and Guzma have been great, and I
seriously appreciate everything you’ve done
for me.
But I wanna join Team Yell and support Marnie!
Are you...serious?
Yeah!!!

Here on Pasio, I finally found something I really
wanna do!
We’re begging you... Please let him go!

He’s giving us hope! Even if we couldn’t complete
the island challenge, we can still have a dream!
We really wanna cheer him on!

So, you’re not lying or giving excuses to leave
the team, huh.
What do you think, Guzma?
Fine.
Really, Guzma?!
But you’ve gotta own up to your choices.
H-huh?
I have an idea.
We’ll become your “wall” to overcome.
If you REALLY wanna leave Team Skull...
then bust down the wall!
N-No way! I gotta beat the two of you?!
Fine! I’ll do it! I’ll break down the wall!
Boss! Plumeria! I’m so sorry but...
I’m gonna back him—just for now!
Same here!
You guys...
You all are such a pain.

Wanna see what destruction looks like? Here it is
in human form—it’s your boy Guzma!
Don’t expect us to go easy on you!
Ah!
Ugh!
Argh!
You call that bein’ serious? I’m not beat down yet!
Aaaaahhhhh!
Ugh... We lost.
Ho...
Never seen him look so disappointed.

The winds of Alola are blowing again, bringing
some new change... Didn’t think they’d reach all
the way to Pasio...
Go on, get moving.
Huh?
Looks like Guzma knows you’re serious.

You went through all of this to show us how much
you want to leave—don’t give up easily, OK?
I won’t allow you to come back to our team.
Guzma... Plumeria...
Don’t push yourself too hard.
Thank you SO MUCH for everything!
*sniff* *sob*
*sniffle* *sob*
You dummies.
What’re you crying for? You wanted this for him.
Um, hi there!

Plumeria, you’re, like, the coolest! I’m totally
in awe!

So, I’ve decided to quit Team Yell to join
Team Skull!
Huh?

Heh, you’re a weird one. Hope you won’t regret
this decision.

Hey, you two! Why don’t you school her on the
rules of Team Skull?
I-I’ll do my best!

Yo, yo, yo! Are you sure you’ve got the guts to
join Team Skull?
Yes, totally!

Wrong! We always reply with a hearty “No!”
Try to act like one of us, bonehead!

Get ready to roll—we’re gonna teach you how to
be bad to the bone!
Ye— I mean, no!
(One story ends, another begins, I guess...)
